CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1952, pg. 3 reads: "Junior Sewing Circle - A group of Hill District youngsters are shown participating in the Sewing Room Exhibit at the end of "Hobbytown," which was held at the Irene Kaufmann Settlement recently. Classes were conducted by Miss Esther Grafman.  Shown with their instructor are Shirley Brown, Shirley Burtch, Mary Reynolds and Florence Hicks. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Instructor Esther Grafman, and students Shirley Brown, Shirley Burtch, Mary Reynolds, and Florence Hicks, participating in Sewing Room Exhibit in Irene Kaufmann Settlement
